author: dag
msg: DERBY-48 A connection request that has a default schema that is being created by another transaction will fail to connect
Patch derby-48-10_4-1, which is a backport of the two trunk patches in this issue.

msg: Changed how update notifiers are handled in the ini, and added more comments to the local.ini file that gets added to the installation.
